description: This file defines interfaces for creating, managing, and executing command objects in a command-line or interactive environment. It contains function prototypes for command lifecycle management, including creation, destruction, execution, and usage display, along with associated data structures.

methods.name: commandCreate
methods.description: Creates a new command instance with specified name, aliases, usage info, and execution function.

methods.name: commandDestroy
methods.description: Releases resources associated with a command instance.

methods.name: commandGetName
methods.description: Returns the long name of a command. Caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: commandGetShortName
methods.description: Returns the optional short name or alias for the command. Caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: commandSetAdvanced
methods.description: Marks a command as advanced to control its visibility based on user mode.

methods.name: commandExecute
methods.description: Executes the specified command with given arguments.

methods.name: commandAddExample
methods.description: Adds an example usage string to a command, aiding user understanding.

methods.name: commandPrintUsage
methods.description: Prints usage information for the command, considering interactive and advanced display modes.
